entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
